did.unittitle: Campaign - Speeches Pending, Kentucky, National Campaign - Campaign Schedule, 15 October 1951 to 3 November 1951 - Clippings, "We Choose Eisenhower" , "Voice of the People: Editorial Endorsing Ike Draws Comments" - The Hartford Times, "Pull out of Korea? Vets Say No" - General Van Fleet, Korea; Clipping, "Text of Van Fleet's Letter" - Clipping, "Stevenson Leads by 2-to-1 Margin in Poll of U.S. Troops in Korea" - Clipping, "Stevenson on Peace", etc. - 4-Page-Statement Re: Great Kentuckians - Memorandum Re: Suggested Angle on Korean Speech - 3-Page-Sppech Re: Communism - Memorandum Re: Material for Vice Presidential Speech, 5 Pages - Speech Material, "Stevenson Is the Key to a Democratic Victory This Fall and Continued Prosperity" - Pamphlet, "Campbell for Congress", Virginia
